astroType.title: Type
astroType.description: The nature or genre of the content of the files in the dataset.

astroFacility.title: Facility
astroFacility.description: The observatory or facility where the data was obtained.

astroInstrument.title: Instrument
astroInstrument.description: The instrument used to collect the data.

astroObject.title: Object
astroObject.description: Astronomical Objects represented in the data (Given as SIMBAD recognizable names preferred).

resolution.Spatial.title: Spatial Resolution
resolution.Spatial.description: The spatial (angular) resolution that is typical of the observations, in decimal degrees.

resolution.Spectral.title: Spectral Resolution
resolution.Spectral.description: The spectral resolution that is typical of the observations, given as the ratio λ/Δλ.

resolution.Temporal.title: Time Resolution
resolution.Temporal.description: The temporal resolution that is typical of the observations, given in seconds.

coverage.Spectral.CentralWavelength.title: Central Wavelength (m)
coverage.Spectral.CentralWavelength.description: The central wavelength of the spectral bandpass, in meters. Enter a floating-point number.

coverage.Spectral.Wavelength.title: Wavelength Range
coverage.Spectral.Wavelength.description: The minimum and maximum wavelength of the spectral bandpass. Enter a floating-point number.

coverage.Spectral.MinimumWavelength.title: Minimum (m)
coverage.Spectral.MinimumWavelength.description: The minimum wavelength of the spectral bandpass, in meters. Enter a floating-point number.

coverage.Spectral.MaximumWavelength.title: Maximum (m)
coverage.Spectral.MaximumWavelength.description: The maximum wavelength of the spectral bandpass, in meters. Enter a floating-point number.

coverage.Temporal.title: Dataset Date Range
coverage.Temporal.description: Time period covered by the data.

coverage.Spatial.title: Sky Coverage
coverage.Spatial.description: The sky coverage of the data object.

coverage.Depth.title: Depth Coverage
coverage.Depth.description: The (typical) depth coverage, or sensitivity, of the data object in Jy

coverage.ObjectDensity.title: Object Density
coverage.ObjectDensity.description: The (typical) density of objects, catalog entries, telescope pointings, etc., on the sky, in number per square degree. Enter a floating-point number.

coverage.ObjectCount.title: Object Count
coverage.ObjectCount.description: The total number of objects, catalog entries, etc., in the data object. Enter an integer.

coverage.SkyFraction.title: Fraction of Sky
coverage.SkyFraction.description: The fraction of the sky represented in the observations, ranging from 0 to 1. Enter a floating-point number.

redshiftType.title: Redshift Type
redshiftType.description: RedshiftType string C 'Redshift'; or 'Optical' or 'Radio' definitions of Doppler velocity used in the data object.

resolution.Redshift.title: Redshift Resolution
resolution.Redshift.description: The resolution in redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s) in the data object. Enter a floating-point number.

coverage.RedshiftValue.title: Redshift Value
coverage.RedshiftValue.description: The value of the redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s) in the data object. Enter a floating-point number.

coverage.Redshift.MinimumValue.title: Minimum
coverage.Redshift.MinimumValue.description: The minimum value of the redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s) in the data object. Enter a floating-point number.

coverage.Redshift.MaximumValue.title: Maximum
coverage.Redshift.MaximumValue.description: The maximum value of the redshift (unitless) or Doppler velocity (km/s) in the data object. Enter a floating-point number.
